name: Animal Poly Fight Simulator
description:
***Animal Fight Simulator***

Animal Fight Simulator is strategy game where you can play campaign in already set enemy formation or you can build your own test battle in sandbox mode.

*** FEATURES ***
• Over 20 different animals and more to come!
• 22 beautiful levels
• 2 game modes : CAMPAIGN and SANDBOX

*** BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED LEVELS ***

Experience real battle simulator worldwide
•Sweden
•Japan
•Hot Middle East
•African Desert
•Western Town
•Europe Mountains and Lakes


*** ANIMALS ***
•Friendly animals
•Poisonous animal
•Panthers
•Tigers
•Dragons
• Bears, Wolves, Elephants, Deers


Every military unit has defined characteristics and outcome of battle depends only on good strategy.
